title: Controlled-entry access, Flexible lease terms available, Refrigerator
posting_body: ['Set in the heart of North Hollywood, The Marquee Apartments is everything you could ever want.', 'With proximity to everything from the sandy Southern California coastline to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of Los Angeles, your most difficult decision will be how to spend the weekends.', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Flexible lease terms available', '-Minutes from the Hollywood Freeway', '-Oversized closets with built-on shelving', '-Refrigerator', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Carpeted flooring available Select units', '-Professional onsite management', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
